participants.name: Samuel Sprunk
participants.paper: Let there be Darkness? Why Science and the Academy are losing ground in 21st century America.

participants.name: David Whitney
participants.paper: The first quarter of the 21st century has been marked by a steady decline of trust in institutions, extending beyond the government to universities, churches,  and science. Increased polarization has accompanied this loss of trust, as an appreciable number of citizens now view their fellow citizens as enemies. This panel seeks to identify some of the causes of this decline, with an emphasis on various "isms." Potential solutions will also be examined.
